title: Sponsor
description: A sponsor is an individual or entity that recruited, instigated, motivated, or otherwise supported the insider's action. A sponsor MUST be associated with at least one insider or accomplice. The sponsor may be associated with multiple insiders or accomplices.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "sponsor--" and is appended with a UUIDv4

name.description: The name of the individual or entity sponsoring the insider's actions

oneOf.title: State Sponsor
oneOf.description: Geopolitical, state, or national military with a speciific country of origin

oneOf.title: Foreign National
oneOf.description: An individual whose objectives are aligned with either the political, commercial, or military interests of a country other than where the incident originated

oneOf.title: Criminal Enterprise
oneOf.description: A group of individuals with an identified hierarchy or structure who engage in significant criminal activity

oneOf.title: Other
oneOf.description: A sponsor type not listed in this vocabulary
